dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S2133 IS: To repeal the Caesar Syria Civilian Protection Act of 2019.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mrs. Shaheen (for herself and Mr. Paul) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations

form.official-title: To repeal the Caesar Syria Civilian Protection Act of 2019.

section.text: The Caesar Syria Civilian Protection Act of 2019 (title LXXIV of division F of Public Law 116â€“92; 22 U.S.C. 8791 note) is hereby repealed.
